title: Mobile responsive styles for player profile modal
description: Full-screen overlay on mobile (<768px). Stacked vertical layout. 16px body font, 44px minimum touch targets. Close button + swipe-down gesture. Sections collapsible on mobile to manage scroll length. Test on iPhone SE, iPhone 14, iPad Mini breakpoints.

florentino_gate.reason: Core product functionality surfacing existing data. Founder-mandated.
